Summary: VERY BRIGHT OBJECT MOVING ACROOS SKY FROM SOUTH TO NORTH , DIMMING OUT AS IT MOVED AND DISSAPEARS.
divs: Sighting DetailsWE WERE OUT LOOKING FOR THE PERSEIDS METEOR SHOWER, WE SAW TOWARD THE SOUTH WEST A VERY BRIGHT OBJECT APPEARED, ALMOS LIKE A STAR, MOVING VERY SLOWLY AND DIMMING OUT AS IT MOVED TOWARDS THE NORTH. WE SAW IT TRACKED IT UNTIL WE NO LONGER HAD VISUAL CONTACT WITH IT. LASTED ABOUT TWO AND A HELF MINUTES. IT WAS NOT A METEOR I KNOW WHAT THEY LOOK LIKE. NO TAIL . NO BURNING BEHIND IT JUST A LIGHT MOVING ACROSS THE SKY. VERY STRANGE. A UFO. RIGHT AFTER WE SAW IT THERE WAS AN OUTBURTS OF AIR, COOL AIR COMING FROM NORHT TO SOUTH THAT SEEM TO COME OUT OF NO WHERE. THE AIR WAS MAYBE IN THE 60'S RANGE. THERE WAS NOT A CLOUD IN SIGHT FOR MILES. SO WE THOUGH THAT WAS VERY UNUSUAL. THE AIR FLOW LASTED FOR ABOUT 5 MINUTES AND THEN QUIT , THERE WAS DEAD SILENCE AFTER THAT. THE AIR RESEMBLE THE DOWN DRAFT RIGHT BEFORE A THUNDER STORM IS APPROACHING. VERY STRANGE.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Tompkinsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
